basic_information.scholarship_name: Joe Ernest Vaughan Endowed Scholarship for Biosciences & Conservation

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science who are pursuing a degree in the Department of Biology. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Student must demonstrate an outstanding academic record Outstanding potential to further the fields of bioscience and conservation Major in Biology, Botany, and/or Natural Science but does not exclude someone who wishes to investigate biochemical, molecular or genetics species 3 letters of reference  2 must be academic but one may be a personal reference regarding the applicants aptitude and enthusiasm for biology and conservation Must be completing 75 hours of coursework Demonstrate financial need

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Biology   or SIS_Major is Biology   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Biology   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Biology
